description: Working as a full stack developer on the AngelMD platform, a web app that connects medical startups, physicians, and investors. Responsibilities include adding new features to the AngelMD web app (React and Ruby-on-Rails) and helping build the new AngelMD mobile app (React Native).

Worked on Vangst GIGS, a web application connecting employers with temporary work in the cannabis industry,  built with React and Node. Responsibilities included writing new features, conducting code reviews, mentoring, and assisting with architecture decisions.

Clients: Gloo, Thrivent, and The Flyfisher Group. Helped to build a serverless application from the ground up that administers surveys and provides visual data to users, built with React and Node, using AWS Lambda. Also helped build a booking and management system for a fly fishing guide service in Angular and Ruby On Rails.

Client: Sling TV. Worked as a front end developer on sling.com. Responsibilities included building and maintaining the shopping cart and account features in AngularJS, modifying supporting APIs in Ruby On Rails, leading a front end community of practice, and training new developers.

Managed and expanded existing relationships for client, VMware, Inc. Focused on strategic, high-dollar accounts. Developed relationships with channel partners. Personally responsible for $25M in bookings.
